Description: ClimateTrade enables companies to offset their carbon footprints. The ClimateTrade API offers programmatic integration to this service. Developers can implement the API to let businesses calculate the exact carbon footprint generated by products or services at the purchase point. A list projects that offset carbon footprints are then offered to the business. Project examples are wind power, solar farms, rice husk co-generation power plants, etc. Interested developers can contact the provider for API and documentation access.
